param.name: baseFloatZIndex
param.label: Dialog Float Index
param.description: The base Z-index for floating dialog windows and popups.

param.name: dialog_backgroundCoverColor
param.label: Dialog Background Cover Color
param.description: The color of the dialog background cover. It should be a valid CSS color string.

param.name: dialog_buttonsOrder
param.label: Dialog Button Order
param.description: The guideline to follow when generating the dialog buttons. There are 3 possible options: 'Operatig System' - the buttons will be displayed in the default order of the user's OS, Left to Right , Right to Left.

param.name: dialog_startupFocusTab
param.label: Dialog Startup Focus Tab
param.description: If the dialog has more than one tab, put focus into the first tab as soon as dialog is opened.
